alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 8:23AM PST until January 20 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches for most valleys, greater over pass routes and the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...White Pine County and Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. * WHEN...Through midnight PST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
